definitions.definition: An enzyme that catalyzes the hydrolysis of sucrose into glucose and fructose ( invert sugar ), used by bees to produce honey and in the food industry to soften chocolate.

main_definition: ( biochemistry , organic chemistry ) An enzyme that catalyzes the hydrolysis of sucrose into glucose and fructose ( invert sugar ), used by bees to produce honey and in the food industry to soften chocolate.
